original_title: Las Orgias Inconfesables de Julius Cesar
overview: Rome is ruled by two emperors, Julius Caesar and Nero, who perform all kinds of orgies to celebrate their vast war triumphs and are controlling alchemy to create a homunculus. This being commits a terrible crime for which the war hero Gaius Prolificus is blamed, who becomes a fugitive from Rome.
tagline: The true history of Rome, without censorship.
title: The Unspeakable Orgies of Julius Cesar
